scripts.bootstrap: yarn && cd ios && pod install && cd .. && cd src/packages/animated && tsc && cd ../transitions && tsc && cd ../gestures && tsc && cd ../navigation && tsc && cd ../svg && tsc && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd src/packages/animated && tsc --watch" "cd src/packages/transitions && tsc --watch" "cd src/packages/gestures && tsc --watch" "cd src/packages/navigation && tsc --watch" "cd src/packages/svg && tsc --watch"
scripts.pack: yarn test && concurrently "echo Building react-native-fluid-animations.$npm_package_version... && cd src/packages/animated && npm pack && mv ./react-native-fluid-animations-$npm_package_version.tgz ../../../dist/react-native-fluid-animations-$npm_package_version.tgz" && concurrently "echo Building react-native-fluid-transitions.$npm_package_version... && cd src/packages/transitions && npm pack && mv ./react-native-fluid-transitions-$npm_package_version.tgz ../../../dist/react-native-fluid-transitions-$npm_package_version.tgz" && concurrently "echo Building react-native-fluid-navigation.$npm_package_version... && cd src/packages/navigation && npm pack && mv ./react-native-fluid-navigation-$npm_package_version.tgz ../../../dist/react-native-fluid-navigation-$npm_package_version.tgz" && concurrently "echo Building react-native-fluid-gestures.$npm_package_version... && cd src/packages/gestures && npm pack && mv ./react-native-fluid-gestures-$npm_package_version.tgz ../../../dist/react-native-fluid-gestures-$npm_package_version.tgz"
scripts.publish-dry: cd ./dist && echo Publishing react-native-fluid-animations.$npm_package_version... && npm publish --dry-run ./react-native-fluid-animations-$npm_package_version.tgz && echo Publishing react-native-fluid-transitions.$npm_package_version... && npm publish --dry-run ./react-native-fluid-transitions-$npm_package_version.tgz && echo Publishing react-native-fluid-navigation.$npm_package_version... && npm publish --dry-run ./react-native-fluid-navigation-$npm_package_version.tgz && echo Publishing react-native-fluid-gestures.$npm_package_version... && npm publish --dry-run ./react-native-fluid-gestures-$npm_package_version.tgz
scripts.publish: cd ./dist && npm login && echo Publishing react-native-fluid-animations.$npm_package_version... && npm publish ./react-native-fluid-animations-$npm_package_version.tgz && echo Publishing react-native-fluid-transitions.$npm_package_version... && npm publish ./react-native-fluid-transitions-$npm_package_version.tgz && echo Publishing react-native-fluid-navigation.$npm_package_version... && npm publish ./react-native-fluid-navigation-$npm_package_version.tgz && echo Publishing react-native-fluid-gestures.$npm_package_version... && npm publish ./react-native-fluid-gestures-$npm_package_version.tgz
